title: Cobb Bat on Shoulder PSA 2 and PSA A
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Cobb Bat on Shoulder PSA 2 and PSA A
posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping and insurance and assume a no-fee payment method.

The Auth is crease-free but has dirt and paper loss.  The 2 is really nice for the grade imo.  No creases, nice registration and centering.  Corner rounding is the only major flaw.

PSA Auth $1900

PSA 2 $4500 SOLD
